New Records: Suryakumar Yadav became the first Indian to achieve 1000 T20I runs in a calendar year
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored 61 runs in 25 deliveries
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav became the first Indian to cross 1000 T20I runs in a calendar year
Miscellaneous Highlights: Suryakumar Yadav has 1026 T20I runs in 28 innings with a highest score of 117 and an average of 44.60
